name: Untitled game about making drinks
description:
A game made for 

Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

The theme "An end is a new beginning" is interpreted as "an end of one drink is a beginning of another one".

The main goal is to guess what ingredients are needed for each drink but to make it easier you can look for recipes here.

I had to cut some parts of the game to make it in time, but I'm happy I finished "something". I like to call it "Cyberpunk gameplay" :P
